dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "uniform float period = 5;&#000a;uniform float shakeAmount = 10;&#000a;&#000a;float tm = period / 100;&#000a;VAR1.x = cos( ( mod(TIME, tm) / (period / 100)) * 2 * 3.14159 ) * shakeAmount / 1000;&#000a;VAR1.y = sin( ( mod(TIME, tm) / (period / 100)) * 2 * 3.14159 ) * shakeAmount / 1000;&#000a;"
